mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date) VALUES(survey_seq.nextval, #{survey_title}, #{seqno}, #{qa_num}, #{qa_contents}, #{start_date}, #{fin_date}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM survey
WHERE (UPPER(survey_title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(qa_contents) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date, r FROM ( SELECT surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY seqno ASC) as r FROM survey ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
